spell.name: Raven's call
entries: Four flocks of malevolent ravens fly out of your hair, from your robes or otherwise misteriously apperance.you can direct them at one target or several.make a ranged spell attack for each flock. on hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} piercing damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: when you cast this spell usign a spell slot of 3rd level ro higher, you create one additional flock for each slot above 2nd

spell.name: Hastur's melody
entries: The caster sings a melody which enters in the target's mind draining the magic and sanity from within.
A creature in line of sight of the caster must succeeds a saving throw using the attribute that use to cast or intelligence if the creature it's not a caster.
If the creature fails loses the higher spell slot. Succeeding the save the creature loses the higher between a 3rd level or lower spell slot.
If the creature is not a caster takes {@damage 4d8} psychic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell usign a spell slot of 4rd level or higher, if the target succeds the saving throw loses the higher between the spell slot level used to cast this spell or lower slot.
